Since SS has his hand tied fighting Epyon he grabbs the saber in his 
teeth.  He feels the heat working at his teeth, lips and gums and he 
begins to bleed energon.

OOC: Dang I was hoping you'd stay outta' this.  You never accept 
damage.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Inside  the Chivtron base, one of the CR chambers begins to make a 
beeping 
> sound. The doors then open and with a whoosh of steam a Blue and 
white Robot 
> steps from it. The figures wings curl around him as a white metal 
feather 
> falls to the ground. He hears the sounds of battle coming from 
outside and 
> his optics begin to glow a bright green. He quickly runs through the 
halls of 
> the base as he heads to the exit which he reaches in a few short 
minutes. he 
> then presses a button causing the door open just enough for him to 
slide out 
> through which he does before it closes again. Once out in the 
sunlight the 
> bot is revealed to be... Zero, the Maximal who had helped the 
Chivtrons in 
> the last battle they were in against the Decepticons only to be 
placed into 
> Stasis lock by his brother. He looks around and catches a glipse of 
> Shadowstar and Luzbel.
> 
> Zero: "I've been in the CR chamber too long. This base is under 
attack 
> again... now I must help."
> 
> Zero quickly flys up to Prowl and Shadowstar and draws his beam 
sabre which 
> he uses to slash at Shadowstar as he charges at prowl.
> 
> Zero: "Need some help?"
